infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: We use tracking to provide you with personalized content and improve your app experience.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Pika Lab needs access to your camera to capture photos that will be transformed into AI-generated videos. For example, you can take a selfie and we'll animate it using our AI effects to create a personalized video.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Pika Lab needs access to your microphone to record audio for your AI-generated videos. For example, you can add sound effects or voiceovers to enhance your video creations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Pika Lab needs permission to save your AI-generated videos to your photo library. For example, after creating a video with our AI effects, you can save it directly to your Photos app to share with friends.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Pika Lab needs access to your photo library to select photos that will be transformed into AI-generated videos. For example, you can choose a photo from your library and we'll animate it using our AI effects to create a personalized video.
